mdRecord.dcterms:description: Discusses pursuit of Meade and Army of Potomac into northern Virginia; withdrawal from Centreville to Rappahannock River. Anticipates going into winter quarters, or opposing Federal move through Fredericksburg or up the Peninsula or being moved to Tennessee. Comments on death of Stonewall Jackson. Includes a short note about shoes from L. H. Paxton to Mr. Patton.
There are three files available: a PDF transcription, a plain text transcription, and a PDF which was created from scans of the original document.
